short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A custom new-tab-page that respects your privacy with drag & drop bookmarks and dark/light mode support. Fast and open source.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Icons for links will be automatically fetched from Google, or you can enter an icon URL. Preferably you pick an image from your computer as icon. It will get saved with your bookmarks and loads instantly, unlike remote icons. This also prevents any potential tracking by whatever party icons are loaded from.
